T02TD1259E:285a-1: st'u pa bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD1259E:285a-3: mchod rten gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD1259E:285a-4: kyee rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1259E:285a-6: bdag dang gzhan gyi don du mchod rten bya bar 'dod na /
T02TD1259E:285a-7: dang por sa la rin po che dang spos chu la sogs pas 'jim pa byas la /
T02TD1259E:285a-8: rang gi mdun du bzhag / rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gsal bar byas la /
T02TD1259E:285a-9: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1259E:285a-10: de nas chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags /
T02TD1259E:285a-11: aom sva bh'a bi shuddha sarba dharm'a sva bh'a ba shu ddho& ham zhes pas 'jim pa mi dmigs par bsgoms la cho ga gsum las kyee rdo rje yab yum gyi skur byed do //
T02TD1259E:285a-12: de nas snying ga'i hr'i:'am h'um gi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag bkug la /
T02TD1259E:285a-13: kyee rdo rje yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa 'od du zhu ste /
T02TD1259E:285a-14: byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa las /
T02TD1259E:285b-0: kyee rdo rje'i snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig @285b gis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1259E:285b-1: aom de pa bi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1259E:285b-4: zhes pa'i sngags de dag gis gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1259E:285b-5: mchod rten re re yang kyee rdo rje re rer bsams la /
T02TD1259E:285b-6: de re re la yang kyee rdo rje du ma 'phro ba dang /
T02TD1259E:285b-7: 'du byas pa las bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par bsam mo //
T02TD1259E:285b-8: de nas rten 'brel gyi snying pos rab tu gnas pa dang mjug bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1259E:285b-9: mchod rten gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1259E:285b-11: // / sgra pa chen po rgyal ba'i snyan bzang po las mnyan te//
T02TD1259E:285b-12: lo tsa ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur ba'o//
